Sentence.string: Good morning Mrs. I’m the investigator who’s charged to clarify Marcus’ death.
Good morning Mr White. First, let me tell you that I don’t believe that Mr Blayton committed suicide.
I knew Marcus very well, we have been friends for a long time. He was simply incapable of doing such a thing, too much self-esteem.
If he didn’t killed himself, someone else did. Any thoughts of someone who could have done such a thing ?

If you want my point of view, that mad man of a Norrington isn’t as pure as the driven snow. He was jealous of Marcus’ success because he didn’t have half of his talent. You should go and talk to him.
